entry.name: deferred.catch
entry.title: deferred.catch()

argument.name: failFilter
argument.desc: A function that is called when the Deferred is rejected.

entry.desc: Add handlers to be called when the Deferred object is rejected.

longdesc.p: deferred.catch( fn ) is an alias to deferred.then( null, fn ). Read its page for more information.

example.desc: Since the jQuery.get method returns a jqXHR object, which is derived from a Deferred object, we can add rejection handlers using the .catch method.
